newsitem.title: USA: Texas power prices hold steady with strong natgas.
newsitem.headline: Texas power prices hold steady with strong natgas.

text.p: Wholesale power prices in the Electric Reliability Council of Texas (ERCOT) held steady Wednesday at relatively strong prices, in line with robust natural gas spot values, brokers and marketers said.
Peak, firm power for Thursday delivery held steady at a bid/ask range of $25.00-26.50, the sources said.
Off peak ERCOT power for Thursday delivery was pegged steady at $13.00-15.00, the sources said.
December peak power was also talked steady at $24.25-24.75, while January/February ERCOT power was said to be holding in the 24.50-25.50 range, the sources said.
Temperatures in Texas were forecast to be above normal from Nov 10 to 14.
